title: AbstractActivityParameter
description:
General parameter value used in one instance of activity.
[Without inheritance, combined specializations.]

Title.title: Title
Title.description: Name of the parameter, used to identify it in the activity. It must have an equivalent in the ActivityTemplate parameters.

Index.title: Index
Index.description: When parameter is an array, used to indicate the index in the array.

Selection.title: Selection
Selection.description: Textual description about how this parameter was selected.

Keys.title: Keys
Keys.description: A nested array describing keys used to identify a parameter value. When multiple values are provided for a given parameter, the key provides a way to identify the parameter through its association with an object, a time index or a parameter array member via ParameterKey value.

items.title: Parameter Key
items.description:
Abstract class describing a key used to identify a parameter value. When multiple values are provided for a given parameter, provides a way to identify the parameter through its association with an object, a time index, an integer... 
[Without inheritance, combined specializations.] Note: floating point numbers are not supported as key values; the numbers have to be formatted as strings for robust equality operations, which are necessary for keys.

ObjectParameterKey.title: Object Parameter Key
ObjectParameterKey.description: Relationship to an object ID, which acts as the parameter.

TimeIndexParameterKey.title: Time Index Parameter Key
TimeIndexParameterKey.description: The time index acting as parameter key value.

ParameterKey.title: Internal Parameter Key
ParameterKey.description: The key name, which establishes an association between parameters.

IntegerParameterKey.title: Integer Parameter Key
IntegerParameterKey.description: Integer value from "ParameterKey" parameter, associated with this parameter. Example: {"ParameterKey": "index", "StringParameterKey: 2}.

StringParameterKey.title: String Parameter Key
StringParameterKey.description: String value from "ParameterKey" parameter, associated with this parameter. Can be used to associate with parameter values of type string or data quantity. In the later case, the string representation of the quantity value will be used. Example: {"ParameterKey": "facies", "StringParameterKey: "shale"}, {"ParameterKey":"depth", "StringParameterKey":"1545.43m"}.

DataObjectParameter.title: Data Object Parameter
DataObjectParameter.description: Parameter referencing to a top level object.

TimeIndexParameter.title: Time Index Parameter
TimeIndexParameter.description: Parameter containing a time index value.  It is assumed that all TimeIndexParameters within an Activity have the same date-time format, which is then described by the FrameOfReference mechanism.

ParameterRoleID.title: Parameter Role
ParameterRoleID.description: Reference data describing how the parameter was used by the activity, such as input, output, control, constraint, agent, predecessor activity, successor activity.

DataQuantityParameterUOMID.title: Data Quantity Parameter UoM ID
DataQuantityParameterUOMID.description: Identifies unit of measure for floating point value.
